name: Sexy Caravan
description:
After Anastacia gave Helena an amazing hot experience during Helena's expedition at the Castle of Lust, she is back to her business: a Sexy Caravan.

Traveling around the Kingdom, Anastacia and her girls worked serving naughty monsters and earning a lot of money. Unfortunately, they didn't earn enough money to upgrade the Caravan and cross the Kingdom's borders. Now, they will work hard to be known worldwide as the best Sexy Caravan ever!

Can Anastacia and her girls serve a lot of clients without them being annoyed by the delay?

Features



  • 15 Different Enemy Types;
  • 15 Different H-Animations;
  • Dynamic Combat (different types of skills);
  • Unique Gallery;
  • Status System (like slow, stun, speed, etc.);
  • Upgrade System;

This game simulates a micro tower defense in which you have to protect Anastacia's caravan. By moving around three lanes while shooting skills, especially Anastacia's seduction one, to make her clients horny enough to pay for Anastacia and her girls' sexual services. Do that before they reach the caravan carpet. During the gameplay, you can receive unique bonuses and face monsters with powerful auras that can provide their friends extra speed, seduction resistance, etc.
developers: Phracassado of the Deep, Oziris Moreira
